TopicTitle: Pressure-triggered parachute not working without commnet?

Articles.Content:
I had set my radial parachutes to trigger (as per ususal) at 0.75 pressure, and deploy at 350m, and as my unmanned capsule descended behind the mountains i lost commnet link, but the parachutes didn't deploy... I thought it was autonomous, just like what altitude to extend the chute?

 

in true kerbal fashion i had forgotten to deploy my chutes. too many new shiny things in 1.2

Edited October 19, 2016 by Poposhka
i suck
